html:
Feb 3 (Reuters) -

  • LENDERS TO INDIA’S FUTURE RETAIL TELL SUPREME COURT THEY HAVE “ALREADY CLASSIFIED/ BEGUN CLASSIFYING” CO'S LOAN ACCOUNT AS NON-PERFORMING ASSET-FILING

  • LENDERS TO FUTURE RETAIL TELL COURT THEY WILL REQUIRE TO PROVISION 80 BLN RUPEES TO 90 BLN RUPEES IMMEDIATELY ON FUTURE LOAN- FILING

  • COUNSEL FOR LENDERS TO FUTURE RETAIL TELLS SUPREME COURT THAT ENTIRE ASSETS OF FUTURE SHOULD BE SUBJECTED TO OPEN BID BY RELIANCE, AMAZON
